column5: My place is close to the airport, parks, grocery stores. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. It is a quiet apartment and there are no disturbances. It is located less than 2 miles from six flags and approx 4 miles from the cowboys stadium and the ballpark. It is a little less than 10 miles from the DFW airport.
